<!-- -->

```{r}
my_model = "neon4cast_example"
baseline = "climatology"
theme = "aquatics"
```

```{r}
scores <- 
  combined_scores(theme, collect = FALSE) |>
  filter(model_id %in% c(my_model, baseline))
```

## Most recent forecast

```{r}
scores |> filter(model_id == my_model, 
                 reference_datetime == max(reference_datetime))

```
